name: Gus the Greedy
response:
Gus the Greedy is a troll with one word for you: 'MONEY.' He’s got more gold than Midas and a heart colder than a swamp in December. For Gus, every river turning to sludge is just a small price to pay—after all, progress demands sacrifices, and he’s the self-appointed CEO of Destruction Inc.

Insurance? Pfft—Gus would burn down the boardroom with a single breath if it weren’t for the fact that he’d probably collect on the policy afterward. Pharma? Gus gives it a shrug and a scratch (probably on his giant troll arm). It’s not sacred, but hey, it works, so Gus will grudgingly respect it.

Crypto? Now *that* gets a grunt of approval. Gus might not understand blockchain, but he knows a shiny thing when he sees one—and if you’re into that, more power to ya. Just don’t expect him to write your LinkedIn recommendation or anything.

Gus the Greedy is the kind of troll who’d lay siege to any kingdom with rotten turnips and pure spite, all while muttering about his next oil deal. Progress? Sure, but only if it’s in his wallet.
